Anh Truong

Sacramento, California USA

 Friday, May 31, 2019
Sacramento, CA—

I didn’t actively realize this is the capital of California, said by many that this is way overshadowed by LA, San Diego, etc. But let’s not discredit this amazing city. I usually don’t post about my national travels (and I haven’t posted things in awhile, whoops) but this is an exception because my adventures here were pretty cool. Great shops, resturaunts and the weather was perfect.
